languages.text: "Это был препарат, который мы, сслиты, вводим себе, чтобы не мерзнуть. А вот что он сейчас делает с твоим телом, я могу только догадываться. Наверное, то, что сейчас произойдет, будет милосердием".

traits.locale_text: "Это был препарат, который мы, сслиты, вводим себе, чтобы не мерзнуть. А вот что он сейчас делает с твоим телом, я могу только догадываться. Наверное, то, что сейчас произойдет, будет милосердием".
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."
languages.original_text: "Это был препарат, который мы, сслиты, вводим себе, чтобы не мерзнуть. А вот что он сейчас делает с твоим телом, я могу только догадываться. Наверное, то, что сейчас произойдет, будет милосердием".

traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “那是我们蛇人注射的药剂，用来保护自己不受寒冷影响。至于它和你的血液起了什么样的反应，我恐怕根本想象不到。我猜，现在无论发生了什么事情，对你而言恐怕都称得上仁慈。”
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."

traits.locale_text: “那是我们西里斯注射的药剂，用来保护自己不受寒冷影响。至于它和你的血液起了什么样的反应，我恐怕根本想象不到。我猜，现在无论发生了什么事情，对你而言恐怕都称得上仁慈。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Eso era un agente que los Sslyth nos inyectamos para protegernos del frío. Solo puedo imaginar los estragos que estará haciendo en tu torrente sanguíneo. Supongo que lo que pase a continuación puede considerarse un acto de piedad».
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."

traits.locale_text: «Eso era un agente que los Sslyth nos inyectamos para protegernos del frío. Solo puedo imaginar los estragos que estará haciendo en tu torrente sanguíneo. Supongo que lo que pase a continuación puede considerarse un acto de piedad».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「今のは我々ススリスが冷気から身を守るために注入する物質だ。貴様の体内で何が起きているのかは想像に難くない。今、この場で貴様を殺すことがせめてもの慈悲だろう」
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「今のは我々ススリスが冷気から身を守るために注入する物質だ。貴様の体内で何が起きているのかは想像に難くない。今、この場で貴様を殺すことがせめてもの慈悲だろう」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Das war ein Agens, das wir Sslyth uns injizieren, um uns vor der Kälte zu schützen. Doch ich kann nur vermuten, was es gerade mit Eurem Körper anstellt. Was auch immer nun geschieht, kann wohl als Akt der Gnade gewertet werden."
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Das war ein Agens, das wir Sslyth uns injizieren, um uns vor der Kälte zu schützen. Doch ich kann nur vermuten, was es gerade mit Eurem Körper anstellt. Was auch immer nun geschieht, kann wohl als Akt der Gnade gewertet werden."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « C'était un agent que les Sslyths comme moi s'injectent pour se protéger du froid. J'ose à peine imaginer ses effets dans votre corps. Quoi qu'il arrive maintenant, vous pourrez le mettre sur le compte de la pitié. »
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."

traits.locale_text: « C'était un agent que les Sslyths comme moi s'injectent pour se protéger du froid. J'ose à peine imaginer ses effets dans votre corps. Quoi qu'il arrive maintenant, vous pourrez le mettre sur le compte de la pitié. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "O iğnede, mensup olduğum Sslyth ırkının soğuktan korunmak için kullandığı bir madde vardı. Şu anda kanında olan biteni hayal dahi edemiyorum. Neyse, sana merhamet ettik say."
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. But I can only guess what it's doing to your body right now. I suppose whatever happens now can be considered an act of mercy."

traits.locale_text: "O iğnede mensup olduğum Sslyth ırkının soğuktan korunmak için kullandığı bir madde vardı. Şu anda kanında neler döndüğünü hayal dahi edemiyorum. Neyse, merhamet göstermiş olduk."
traits.speaker: Anger
